title: Physical Prototype and Refined Costing
guardrails: Follow the approved IP and design guidelines.
Ensure all deliverables meet quality and licensing standards.

tasks.title: Select prototyping method(s) with comparison of cost/time/resources.
tasks.description: Perform the task 'Select prototyping method(s) with comparison of cost/time/resources.' by creating the deliverables specified for this task and ensuring they meet the acceptance criteria.

deliverables.description: Prototype build plan comparing at least 3 methods:

tasks.title: Build physical prototype(s) and test ergonomics, durability, and basic mechanism reliability.
tasks.description: Perform the task 'Build physical prototype(s) and test ergonomics, durability, and basic mechanism reliability.' by creating the deliverables specified for this task and ensuring they meet the acceptance criteria.

acceptance.text: At least 1 prototype per shortlisted concept completed.
Mechanism functions reliably in ≥3 repeated trials.

tasks.title: Update unit cost and preliminary tooling
tasks.description: Perform the task 'Update unit cost and preliminary tooling' by creating the deliverables specified for this task and ensuring they meet the acceptance criteria.
